Name: Gales of Reverie
Title: Wanderer: Gales of Reverie
Source: Reward for inviting the Wanderer to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Gales of Reverie
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1506]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1506] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S15062]</color> once.
When your $[A1506], who has this card equipped, is in <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115061]</color> state and after using $[K51]: you will spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character" and deal 1 $[K105].
(You must have $[A1506] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C115061.Name: Windfavored
C115061.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached performs a Normal Attack:</color> DMG dealt +2. If the opponent has characters on standby, then this Skill will deal damage to the next opposing character on standby instead.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K51.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>
K51.Desc: Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.

K105.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>
K105.Desc:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
